export * from './../components-js/partials';
export * from './../components-js/testing';
export declare const minifyCss: (css: string) => string;
export declare const stripFocusAndHoverStyles: (css: string) => string;

export * from './../../../components-js/partials';

import type { FC } from 'react';
export declare const Required: FC;
export * from './../../../../components-js/utilities/js';

const minifyCss = (css) => css.replace(/\s\s+|\.\\(?=:)|[\n\\]+| (?={)|;(?=\s+})|(:|media)\s(?=.*;?)/g, '$1');

export { minifyCss };

const stripFocusAndHoverStyles = (css) => css.replace(/\n.*(?::focus|hover:hover)[\s\S]+?\n}/g, '');

export { stripFocusAndHoverStyles };
